scripts.build: npm run build:linux && npm run build:osx && npm run build:win32
scripts.dist: npm run dist:linux && npm run dist:osx && npm run dist:win32
scripts.dist:osx: npm run build:osx && mkdir -p "dist/" && tar -czf "dist/$npm_package_productName-darwin-x64-$npm_package_version.tar.gz" -C build/ "$npm_package_productName-darwin-x64"
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build:linux && mkdir -p "dist/" && tar -czf "dist/$npm_package_productName-linux-x64-$npm_package_version.tar.gz" -C build/ "$npm_package_productName-linux-x64"
scripts.dist:win32: npm run build:win32 && mkdir -p "dist/" && pushd build/ && zip -q -r "../dist/$npm_package_productName-win32-ia32-$npm_package_version.zip" "$npm_package_productName-win32-ia32" && popd
scripts.publish:beta: npm run publish:linux-beta && npm run publish:osx-beta && npm run publish:win32-beta
scripts.publish:release: npm run publish:linux-release && npm run publish:osx-release && npm run publish:win32-release
